name: Sky Minigolf
description:
First ever project I've made in Unity! Just a short minigolf game, with three holes to try to beat!

Controls:

Arrow Keys to change the angle of the ball and the power you want to hit it with.

Press Enter to hit the ball.

Press Escape to restart the hole.

There is no fullscreen button for this game as I don't yet know how to make the UI scale with the screen size.
